definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

the nine schools of thought, philosophical schools of the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC), viz Confucians 儒家[Ru2 jia1], Daoists 道家[Dao4 jia1], Yin and Yang 陰陽家|阴阳家[Yin1 yang2 jia1], Legalists 法家[Fa3 jia1], Logicians 名家[Ming2 jia1], Mohists 墨家[Mo4 jia1], Diplomats 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1], Miscellaneous 雜家|杂家[Za2 jia1], and Agriculturalists 農家|农家[Nong2 jia1]
going from there to lower grades (idiom)
dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion/dissident group
erhua variant of 頂尖|顶尖[ding3 jian1]
with an undeserved reputation (idiom); unwarranted fame/nowhere near as good as he's made out to be
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
top-notch (colloquial)/to push oneself to the front
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
stepping-stone to greater power or higher rank
